entry.title: Omicron Puts China's 'Zero-Covid' Strategy to Its Toughest Test
entry.content: The country’s continuing effort to remain in a bubble points to more frequent and longer-lasting restrictions with the arrival of the highly contagious variant.

entry.title: Kazakhstan Blames Violent Protests on Criminals; 'It Was Hell'
entry.content: The country’s protests over fuel-price rises were largely peaceful for three days before descending into violence. The government and the original protesters more or less agree on one point: Demonstrations were hijacked by violent criminals seeking to destabilize the nation and effect a coup.
